value:
$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|Hold.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Alfonse! The enemy!$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|I am Thrasir, general of the realm of
the dead. I am feared as the
Omnicidal Witch.$k$pEveryone will perish. That is why I
have come...$k$p$Sbs150|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Again, the enemy has vanished.$k$p$EFace_Cool2|That name, Thrasir—it rings a bell.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|The first emperor of Embla.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|She's Princess Veronica's ancestor?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|So she must be. She was a witch so
powerful she could lay waste to an
entire realm if she so chose...$k$p$EFace_Anger|Líf and Thrasir... It would seem that
the legendary rulers from our history
books are now our enemies.$k$p$Sbs150|
